title: Pinjula Pinjula Song Lyrics From Simba
stanzas:
Pinjula pinjula
manam vedhumbi
thavikuthada lifeu.
nenjula ulla
manjaa soru
edukkuthada loveu.(2)

daavadicha ponnu ippo
dive-u adichitaa
kadhale venaamunu
kaiyya virichitaa

thaaya katta pol irundhaale
ondi katta aakkiputaale
ondi katta aakkiputaale

Sondham bandham odhungi pochu
kanna muzhi pidhungi pochu
aadhavaraa anaichikathaan
yaarum illa maamu.

niyaabaga azhukai ellaam
thuvachida manasukoru
soapa yaarum idhuvaraikkum
kandupudikkala maamu

dhamaa thundu nenju
adhu nenje illa panju
theeya vachi poyitaale
thirumu pudicha vanji.

thanimayil manasukulla
karaiyiraan ivane
ondi katta aakkiputaale
ondi katta aakkiputaale

andhuruchu dangu vaaru
ava manam thaarumaaru
sandhu pondhu indhu
idukkil sandhosame ledhu

rendu kattaan vayasulathaan
thundu thundaa aakkiputta
gundu katta thookki poatu
kumuruthaiyaa soodhu

kattam katti vachi
ivana velukkathaiyaa machi
kaalam pannum kolam
romba kodumaiyada machi
